itemDescription: Keeper of the regalia in Scotland

wikipedia_page.main: Sir Adam Ferguson (1770–1854) was deputy keeper of the regalia in Scotland.

response: Between 1821 and 1824 Gattonside House was the home of Sir Adam Ferguson, Deputy Keeper of the Scottish Regalia and close friend of Sir Walter Scott.British Listed Buildings-Gattonside House
* Sir Adam Ferguson (British Army officer) (1771–1855), his son, keeper of the regalia in Scotland
His brother was Sir Adam Ferguson. His great uncle was Joseph Black.
